title: Beginnings
description: Married couple Allen and Allie spice up their life with some hot sexy adventures. In volume one we meet Allen and Allie and get a peek at them in action. This is a quick introduction to begin a new series that will include more characters, longer stories and hotter sex. In this first story Allie's husband Allen has put the final touches on a room he built especially for her. When Allen wakes Allie to let her know there is a familiar gleam sparkling in her eyes and Allen is sporting just the response she is looking for. First in a series.M/F
author: Chase Boehner
